content.question: ​The table gives the average rates of change for the functions <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math>, <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math>, <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math>, and <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> for certain intervals of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>. Which of the functions is best modeled by a piecewise-linear function with two linear segments with different slopes?

topic.text: 1.13: Function Model Selection and Assumption Articulation

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
